newsitem.title: LEBANON: Lebanon's foreign debt rises $12 mln in June.
newsitem.headline: Lebanon's foreign debt rises $12 mln in June.

text.p: Lebanon's foreign debt rose $12 million in June to $1.526 billion, the Bank of Lebanon said in its latest monthly bulletin on Tuesday.
Foreign debt stood at nearly $1.290 billion in December 1995.
Net total public debt rose 313.4 billion Lebanese pounds in June to 13,637 billion pounds against 13,324 in May, the Bank said.

"The increase in debt was mainly due to the rise in net domestic debt which reached at end June 11,234 billion Lebanese pounds against 10,939 billion at end May, increasing by 294.6 billion, a rise of 2.69 percent," the Bank added.
It gave the following details on the country's debt:
